description: Aegility Half Zip Longsleeve Men is a functional shirt for hiking. Quick-drying and breathable for greater comfort and featuring Polygiene antimicrobial treatment to reduce unpleasant odors. Pleasant lightweight stretch material for a feel-good factor. The practical front zipper makes the shirt easier to put on. The Aegility Half Zip Longsleeve Men impresses with its functional design in a trendy melange effect for a cooler look.
name: Mammut Aegility Half Zip LS - Mens
